
{{alias}}( buffer )
    Returns a JSON representation of a buffer.

    The returned JSON object has the following properties:

    - type: value type
    - data: buffer data as a generic array

    Parameters
    ----------
    buffer: Buffer
        Buffer to serialize.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Object
        JSON representation.

    Examples
    --------
    > var buf = new {{alias:@stdlib/buffer/alloc-unsafe}}( 2 );
    > buf[ 0 ] = 1;
    > buf[ 1 ] = 2;
    > var json = {{alias}}( buf )
    { 'type': 'Buffer', 'data': [ 1, 2 ] }
